security: The source is identified as Liaison Section [CIA ]Amenian Embassy Madrid. THIS IS LOANED TO YOU BY THE FBI, AND NEITHER IT NOR ITS. CONTENTS ARE TO BE DISTRIBUTED OUTSIDE THE AGENCY TO WHICH LOANED.
summary: FBI and CIA documents regarding Miriam Finkelman Winner, a Cuban citizen residing in Madrid, including her personal history and activities, with a focus on whether she poses a threat or intends to enter the United States.
summary_one_paragraph: These documents consist of an FBI memorandum and supporting correspondence from the Legat in Paris and the CIA Liaison Section in Madrid concerning Miriam Finkelman Winner, a Cuban citizen. The documents detail Winner's background, including her birth in Poland, Cuban citizenship, education, and employment as the Director of English Language at the Mangold Institute in Madrid. The FBI is investigating Winner, but closing its case since she resides in Spain, has no history in the U.S., and isn't expected to immigrate; the CIA source adds that Winner is believed to be living with an unidentified Cuban exile.
title: Myriam Finkelman Winer - Personal History and BKG
